assignments.name: gruposId
assignments.value: ={{ $json["body"]["gruposcomid"].split("\n").map(grupo => ({ id: grupo.match(/^\d+/)[0], nome: grupo.match(/^[^()]+/)[0].trim(), idGrupo: grupo.match(/(\d+@g\.us)/)[0] })) }}

options.fileName: =relatorio_de_envios_{{ new Date($now).toLocaleDateString("pt-BR", { day: "2-digit", month: "2-digit", year: "numeric" }).replace(/\//g, "-") + "_" + new Date($now).toLocaleTimeString("pt-BR", { hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit" }) }}.xls
